scripts.build: npm run build:vanilla && npm run build:react
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/vanilla/dist packages/react/dist node_modules packages/vanilla/node_modules packages/react/node_modules
scripts.publish:vanilla: npm run build:vanilla && npm publish -w wawa-vfx-vanilla
scripts.publish:react: npm run build && npm publish -w wawa-vfx
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:vanilla && npm run publish:react
